properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued February 11 at 4:06PM EST until February 13 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Lakeshore Flood Watch, which is in effect from Thursday morning
through Thursday evening.

* LAKE SHORE FLOODING AND BEACH EROSION...Strong northwest winds
will cause 8 to 12 foot waves, possibly as high as 15 feet.

* TIMING...Thursday and early Thursday night.

* IMPACTS...Another round of severe beach erosion is likely given
record high Lake Michigan water levels and strong northwest
winds.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Watch means that conditions favorable for
lakeshore flooding to develop. If you are on or near the shore
you should take action to protect your property and listen for
later statements and warnings.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING
